name: The maze game (aleagames)
description:
Welcome to The Maze !

You are at the end of the world. A group of scientists exploit you to carry out experiments that can guarantee the survival of human species. Unfortunately, these experiences do not take into account your own survival !

Escape their hold through The Maze . For that, you have to find the key to open the door of the maze. Unless you find the key of the door, the door will open. The mini-map display the maze and where you can find the door.

Enjoy your playing through ten (10) marvelous levels ! Your sense of direction will be solicited.
